Privacy Policy
• What kind of Private Information does City Malls mobile app collect?

1. Your names, gender, email address, mobile number (to send OTP for registration to be successful), shop details and product details.

2. Your real time location information to bring all shoppers to you.

3. Technical information about your device such as operating system information, hardware related info, mobile carrier info (if available).

4. Access to use media from phone for the purpose of adding profile image to shop profiles and for adding images to offers published.
• Why is this information collected?

a) Your City malls account is associated to the City Malls app with the help of your mobile number. All vital functions such as posting offer on the app, checking out customers who’ve chosen you as their favourite, customize search to be more useful to shoppers and similar functions are reliant on the location the app receives thanks to your private details and mobile number.
b) Furthermore the required information is used to enhance City Malls team’s research activities for the purpose of increasing the effectiveness of our network and related Services, which then help us in developing new features for the City Malls community to make shopping a pleasurable experience for all.

c) Also the contact information provided by you shall be used by City Malls to send you relevant app upgrade notices and sponsored promotions.
d) Please note that your acceptance to this privacy policy implies you give City Malls every right to contact you by SMS or e-mail for any such promotions or as required for the purpose improving the City Malls app or as needed
e) Effectiveness of mall and offer search as per the requirements of the user depends upon this information.
f) Required contact information is collected for publishing offers, creating brand value, and shall be used for future feature updates.
• Is My Information Shared with other parties?
No. We don’t share private information with third parties except those affiliated with the City Malls app and that too for promotion related activities.
• Determining mobile device location

Our Services are reliant on the location you provide, so in order for City malls to provide you the best offers that are nearest to you we need to know your location.\nWhenever you use the City Malls app the location information you provide or let us pick from your mobile device or browser (latitude & longitude details) is used to customize the mall shopping experience of your probable customers with respect to your current location (i.e., we'll show you a list of nearby malls, brands and shops).\nCity Malls app further uses your mobile device's ‘background location to provide those who have chosen you as their favourite get notification updates about your recent offers in malls or shops or brands that you have explicitly showcased in your shop.
• Location Sharing on the City Malls app

Please be assured that your mobile’s real-time location is shared with any mall/shop/brand or anyone on the City Malls app in a way to specifically identify you. City Malls app brings customers to you hence required location data.
